column5: Bullish engulfing I am long I know its quiet here but still surprised no one is talking about this MO Juul Labs gives SWFs access to its booksSources tell the NY Post that the company is hoping that it will be able to sell a stake at a valuation of more than 300share vs the 249share when Altria bought its 35An insider tells the NY Post that Juul is looking to raise 10B and the company wants the money to provide a dividend for existing investors rather than to fund growthInsiders tell the NY Post that Juul isnt formally launching a financing round but a source tells the NY Post that Juul is only opening its books because it thinks it will get an offer at a valuation it likes
MO dont mind mo just smoking bears

CRON this is the biggest short I have EVER seenstock is now 80x EVsales and theyve already tipped their cards on their MO exit plan which means no takeout for at least 2yrs and no other buyer This is worth 5 EPIC SHORT at these levels Nothing can sustain these valuation levels ever
